addOwner(address).notice: add as owner. owner can grant unlimited allowlists

addToAllowlist(address).notice: adds address to allowlist if user is on the allowlist or ownerallowlisted addresses can only allowlist once and their target cannot allow another in turn

isAllowedOwner(address).notice: checks if is owner for protocol maintainance priviledges

documentation.text:
@notice adds address to allowlist if user is on the allowlist or owner
 @notice allowlisted addresses can only allowlist once and their target cannot allow another in turn

@notice add as owner. owner can grant unlimited allowlists
 @param owner_ address to add as owner

@notice checks if is owner for protocol maintainance priviledges
 @param subject address to check
